Package fi.fta.controllers

Class CategoryBeansController<C extends CategoryBean,CUI extends CategoryBeanUI,CM extends CategoryBeanManager<C,CUI,? extends CategoryBeanDAO<C>>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • fi.fta.controllers.CategoryBeansController<C,CUI,CM>
  • Type Parameters:
    C - wrapper for database data
    CUI - wrapper for JSON data
    CM - data manager
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CategoriesController, ServicesController

    public class CategoryBeansController<C extends CategoryBean,CUI extends CategoryBeanUI,CM extends CategoryBeanManager<C,CUI,? extends CategoryBeanDAO<C>>>
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller for categories and services common operations.

    Usually operation is restricted to the rights of currently logged user.

    Author:
    andrysta

      • position

        @RequestMapping(value="/position/{id}/{position}",
                method=POST)
@ResponseBody
public SimpleMessage position​(@PathVariable("id")
                              java.lang.Long id,
                              @PathVariable("position")
                              java.lang.Integer position,
                              javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                              javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
        Changes queue position of identified category related object in a parent category if the user has rights.
        Parameters:
        id - database ID of category related object, which position is changing
        position - a new position in parent category
        request - http request
        response - http response
        Returns:
        success or error message
